H0.text: Antiviral drugs are formulated to help deal with HIV, herpes, influenza, and two types of hepatitis.

H1.text: Antibacterial drugs are formulated to help deal with HIV and herpes as well as influenza and two types of hepatitis.

H2.text: Steroid drugs are formulated to help deal with HIV, herpes, influenza, and two types of hepatitis.

H3.text: Herbal remedies are drugs formulated to help deal with HIV and herpes, as well as influenza and two types of hepatitis.

A4.text: Most of the antiviral drugs now available are designed to help deal with HIV, herpes viruses, the hepatitis B and C viruses, and influenza A and B viruses.

A5.text: Antiviral drugs are a class of antimicrobials, a larger group which also includes antibiotic (also termed antibacterial), antifungal and antiparasitic drugs, or antiviral drugs based on monoclonal antibodies.
